name: phaser-cordova-webpack-boilerplate
description: Phaser.js and cordova boilerplate so you donâ€™t have to do it.

scripts.start: npm install && npm install -g cordova && npm run cordova-folder
scripts.cordova-folder: mkdir cordova && cp -a config.xml ./cordova && cd cordova && mkdir platforms && mkdir www && cordova platform add android
scripts.copy-files: webpack -p && cp index.html ./cordova/www && cp base.css ./cordova/www && cp -a ./assets ./cordova/www
scripts.deploy-prod: rm -rf ./apk/XXX.apk && npm run build-prod && npm run align-apk && npm run sign-apk
scripts.build: rm -rf ./cordova && npm run cordova-folder && npm run copy-files && cd cordova && cordova build android
scripts.build-prod: rm -rf ./cordova && npm run cordova-folder && npm run copy-files && cd cordova && cordova build android --release --keystore=../keystore/release-key.jks --storePassword=XXX --alias=XXX --password=XXX
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run deploy
scripts.test-prod: npm run build-prod && npm run deploy-prod && cd cordova && cordova run android --release

author: bimyou
